name: Cinnamon Chicken
author: OAKBORN
summary: Chicken breasts baked with cinnamon and other seasonings. This is a recipe that I created while working at a flight kitchen. We had cinnamon in the spice collection that nobody used for anything, so I decided to try it on chicken and the flight crews and my family loved it!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Sprinkle evenly with ground cinnamon, seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper
(Note: You can be liberal with the seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper; however, the cinnamon should only be a dusting and not clumped
) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear
